title: The Morning After: Netflix just added more than 15 million subscribers
description: This morning we'll look at Netflix's stay-at-home streaming numbers, a review of the new book about Instagram and Razer's latest gaming-ready ultrabook.
content: With so many of us stuck at home, it’s no surprise that streaming numbers spiked. On Tuesday afternoon, Netflix gave a peek at just how much, with quarterly earnings numbers revealing it added nearly 16 million customers worldwide. Going by its new standards … [+2028 chars]
